title: Language Proficiency Advancement Program Through Program-Based Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic theories of language education and assessment, along with practical experience
context.additional_context: Cultivates the ability to design and analyze complex language proficiency assessments for in-service professionals.

learning_goals: A language assessment system can be developed by applying the four-stage program-based assessment design (Assessment-Contextualization-Prioritization-Justification).
By integrating and analyzing diverse assessment tools and data, learners' comprehensive language proficiency can be evaluated.
Through stakeholder collaboration, a balance between educational objectives and practical requirements can be achieved in assessment design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
